title: Need to change the email on my account ASAP
body: The email currently linked to my account was shut down, and so now I cannot update the email because it sends a confirmation code to the old one that I have no access to. What should I do?

replies.body: We can help!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) which will be fielded to our account team.  We'll get back to you and assist with updating your info as soon as we can!
